name: 張詠翔
objective:
本堂課會探討幾個語言學子領域以及跨語言學、行為科學和社會科學之基礎課題：語言習得、社會語言學、心理語言學、語言變遷等。
依據學生將學習以實驗性的方法搜集資料、來探討他們選擇的語言現象。
This course will explore a variety of disciplines within linguistics as well as some cross-interdisciplinary linguistic domains. 
Students will learn to use experimental methods to collect data to investigate the language phenomenon of their choice.
schedule: A detailed syllabus will be distributed on the first day of class.
scorePolicy:
Attendance 10%
Participation 10%
Quizzes 30% 
Oral presentation 20%
Final group project 30%
